notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This project is funded by the Health and Medical Research Fund (Grant no. 13140671), Food & Health Bureau, HKSAR Government. The funding body was not directly involved in the design of the study and collection, analysis, and interpretation of data and in writing the manuscript as these were all prepared by the authors. However, the funding body had referees who had requested the authors to amend the proposals during the grant application process.
